channel.title: root system architecture on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in root system architecture on funPlantGenes

item.title: GmEIL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g274600 Gene Symbol: GmEIL4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEIL4 enhances soybean (Glycine max) phosphorus efficiency by improving root system development.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.
